name: Candle x Parasite
description:
Controls 

- wasd (movement)
- arrow keys (movement)
- spacebar (jump)

A very short game about being in a parasite and also being a candle

list of excuses for why it's so short and unpolished
- I started this game jam the day of the deadline
- I had exams
- I haven't done any coding for a year
- I'm lazy

Overall I'm quite happy with this anyway. Finally got back into dev a bit, but I still like doing the art more
